title: Cant get the rewards from 2015/2016
body: Why are my rewards for season 2015/2016 still not recieved even though you said you fixed the issue? PLat 5 this season and dont have no maokai skin no icon or platinum border. Dont know whats the issue.

replies.body: Rewards have been distributed to eligible players.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can look into your specific issue individually, as well as provide further context.  We'll reply back as soon as we can.
I have already sent a support ticket 3 or 4 days ago and still havent got an answer that is why im asking over here because i dont know if it take more time to reply or you just didnt...
